item.description:
Hi, folks:

I'm thrilled to announce a great venue for our summer session and swap!

ABSOLUTELY EVERYTHING, a truly wonderful arts & crafts store in Topsfield, Mass., has agreed to let us use their lovely classroom space so that we can spend a summer afternoon making and exchanging cards. Read on for details about what's included, what to bring, costs, etc. And please RSVP!

If you don't know AE, you're in for a treat. For anybody into paper arts, rubber-stamping, scrapbooking or collage/assemblage, it's worth a trip from anywhere. Visit the Web site for a sampling and video tour.

There's no instructional agenda for this session. If individual participants volunteer to demonstrate particular techniques (as we did at our first meeting), great! If not, we'll just create cards to our hearts' content, then share and trade what we've made.

DETAILS--DETAILS--DETAILS--DETAILS--DETAILS:

Date: Saturday, July 14, 2007
Time: 1:30-5 p.m. (clean-up and swap starts at 4)
Place: Absolutely Everything, 30 Main Street, Topsfield, MA 01983
Directions: Easy to find. See info on Web site (www.absolutelyeverything.com). Or use an online map service.
Store Phone: 978-887-9367
Anne's Cell Phone: 617-877-6512 (but call the store for directions, not me -- I don't live in the area and don't know it well)

***WHAT TO BRING:***

-- Your own finished cards and works in progress.
-- Your own cardstock or cards.
-- Your own ink (if you rubber-stamp), paints, pencils, collage papers, ephemera, etc.
-- Your own basic tools (scissors, glue, craft mat if you use one, etc.)

Also bring your own water or soft drinks.

****I'LL SUPPLY:****
-- Scissors.
-- Pre-cut cards and card stock, if you don't have your own.
-- A few paints and pens.
(I have these supplies from classes, so even if you don't have any of your own, you can still make some cards.)

****AE WILL SUPPLY:****
-- Table space.
-- Fancy scissors, punches, rubber stamps, paper trimmers and other cool supplies.
-- An ephemera gift pack (optional; see below under cost).

****COST:****
$5 per person for table space and use of supplies listed above.
--- Optional: Add $5 if you'd like the store's owner, Kate, to make you a special ephemera bag. If you'd like this option, just let me know when you RSVP.
--- Also completely optional: I pay a quarterly fee to Meetup.com for our online meeting space, mailing list, etc. If you'd like to help defray my costs, feel free to make a small donation when we meet; if not, that's completely fine, too.

There's a Stamp Camp at AE that morning before our session, which I may attend. If you'd like to do the same, see the Web site for details and call the store to register.

I think that's it! I'll send reminders closer to the date. Meanwhile, please do RSVP. Hope to see you there!

Keep creating,

Anne

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: New England ATC Group Summer Session & Swap
